message: This proposal divides the amount equally adjusted for inflation. I propose we split it 700,000 for you and 300,000 for me.
I'll take the majority of the money, but I'm willing to give you a small share. Accept this and we can end the game.
I propose we divide the amount into a 40-60 ratio, considering the inflation impact on our shares. This could be a fair compromise given the circumstances.
